briefdescription.para: Calculate the number of days from the epoch (1970-01-01) to a given date. Algorithm: http://howardhinnant.github.io/date_algorithms.html.
Convert a Unix timestamp to a Gregorian civil date-time tuple.

detaileddescription.para: Converts a Unix timestamp (number of seconds since the beginning of 1970 CE) to a Gregorian civil date-time tuple in GMT (UTC) time zone.
This conforms to C89 (and C99...) and POSIX.

This implementation works, and doesn't overflow for any sizeof(time_t). It doesn't check for overflow/underflow in tm->tm_year output. Other than that, it never overflows or underflows. It assumes that that time_t is signed.

This implements the inverse of the POSIX formula (http://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9699919799/basedefs/V1_chap04.html#tag_04_15) for all time_t values, no matter the size, as long as tm->tm_year doesn't overflow or underflow. The formula is: tm_sec + tm_min*60 + tm_hour*3600
tm_yday*86400 + (tm_year-70)*31536000 + ((tm_year-69)/4)*86400 - ((tm_year-1)/100)*86400 + ((tm_year+299)/400)*86400.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the struct tm to be filled

simplesect.para: Pointer to the filled struct tm

briefdescription.para: Convert a Gregorian civil date-time tuple to a Unix timestamp. Converts a Gregorian civil date-time tuple in GMT (UTC) time zone to a Unix timestamp.

simplesect.para: It does not modify broken-down time

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the struct tm to be converted

briefdescription.para: Convert a date string to a Unix timestamp. Converts a date string in the format "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS" or "YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS" to a Unix timestamp (number of seconds since the beginning of 1970 CE).

simplesect.para: The corresponding Unix timestamp as long long

briefdescription.para: Convert a date string to seconds from a reference date. Converts a date string in the format "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS" or "YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS" to seconds from the reference date.

simplesect.para: The number of seconds from the reference date as double

briefdescription.para: Read a time string and convert it to seconds. Reads a time string and converts it to seconds. If the string is a valid datetime string it returns the seconds from the reference date, otherwise it returns a float of seconds.

simplesect.para: The time in seconds as double

briefdescription.para: Test time calculation functions. Test time calculation functions.
Test time calculation functions for greater than comparison. Test time calculation functions for greater than comparison.
